faq.title: Have Questions? We've Answered Them!
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about Digital Reception
faq.ctaQuestion: Don't have an answer to your question?

q1.question: Why is a self check-in kiosk better than a mobile app?
q1.answer: The kiosk eliminates all barriers for guests - no app installation, registration, or roaming complications. Foreign guests often don't have a local number or the habit of installing apps. With a kiosk, all the guest needs to do is come to reception and get their key in 30 seconds. Simple, fast, without any prior preparation needed from the guest.

q2.question: How much does it cost and how quickly does the investment pay off?
q2.answer: Call us or schedule a demo meeting for exact prices that are formed according to your needs and service packages. The price includes: touchscreen kiosk, installation, PMS integration, staff training, first year of maintenance. Most hotels recover their investment in 8-12 months through reduced staff costs, increased efficiency, and higher guest satisfaction (better ratings = more bookings).

q3.question: What does the check-in process look like for guests?
q3.answer:
The process is simple and takes 30-60 seconds:
1) Guest scans QR code or enters reservation number
2) System automatically loads data from PMS
3) Guest confirms or updates data
4) System automatically registers guest in eTourist
5) Card payment (if needed)
6) Printing receipt and issuing keycard
7) System sends email with all stay details

Everything happens on one screen, intuitively and quickly!

q4.question: Does it integrate with PMS systems?
q4.answer: Yes! Digital reception integrates with most popular PMS systems such as Opera, Cloudbeds, Mews, Protel, Fidelio, HotelTime, and others. Integration enables real-time synchronization of reservations, room availability, prices, and check-in status. If you use a less known PMS, contact us - we probably already support it or can add support.

q5.question: How long does digital reception installation take?
q5.answer: Installation takes between 2-4 hours, depending on the complexity of integration with existing systems. The process includes: physical kiosk installation, PMS connection, payment configuration, testing, staff training. After installation, our team remains available for 24/7 support. The system is ready to use immediately after installation!

q6.question: Can I test before purchasing?
q6.answer: Absolutely! We offer a free demo presentation where you can see the system live and try all functions. The demo lasts 30 minutes and can be online (Google Meet/Zoom) or live at your hotel. We can also arrange a visit to a hotel already using our system so you can see it in practice. No obligation - our goal is for you to be 100% confident in your decision before purchasing.

q7.question: What kind of technical support is provided?
q7.answer: We offer 24/7 technical support via phone, email, and remote desktop. Most problems are resolved within 15 minutes via remote access. The system automatically sends notifications about potential issues (e.g., printer out of paper), so we can resolve them before guests notice a problem. Regular software updates are installed automatically at night when there are no guests.

q8.question: What if a guest doesn't want to use the kiosk?
q8.answer: The kiosk doesn't replace reception - it complements it! Guests who prefer human contact can still check in at reception. But statistics show that 85% of guests, after seeing how fast kiosk check-in is once, voluntarily use the kiosk next time. Younger generations (Gen Z, Millennials) expect self-service options, while older generations learn quickly when they see how simple it is.

software.title: Software Features

faq.title: Detailed Technical Information
faq.subtitle: Answers to technical questions about specifications, integrations, and functionalities
faq.ctaSubtitle: Schedule a meeting with our technical team

q1.question: What are the technical specifications of the kiosk?
q1.answer: The kiosk comes with a 21.5-inch Full HD touchscreen (1920x1080), Intel i5 processor (11th generation), 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB NVMe SSD, integrated card reader (NFC/RFID/Contactless), thermal receipt printer (80mm), 1080p camera for QR scanning, and WiFi 6/Gigabit Ethernet connectivity. The housing is made of stainless steel, dimensions: 180cm (H) x 40cm (W) x 40cm (D), weight: ~25kg with anti-vandal protection.

q2.question: Which languages does the system support?
q2.answer: The system supports over 25 languages including: Serbian, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Ukrainian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Turkish, Greek, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, and many others. The language automatically changes based on the guest's nationality from the reservation, or guests can manually select the language on the initial screen.

q3.question: Which PMS systems do you support and how does integration work?
q3.answer: We support all leading PMS systems: Opera Cloud, Cloudbeds, Mews, Protel, Fidelio, HotelTime, Clock PMS+, eZee FrontDesk, Little Hotelier, RoomRaccoon, and many others. Integration is done via REST API or SOAP and includes real-time synchronization of reservations, check-in/check-out communication, folio transactions, room status updates, and guest profile sync. Average integration time: 2-5 business days.

q4.question: How does integration with the eTurista (eVisitor) system work?
q4.answer: Our system is officially certified and integrated with the eTurista API system. It automatically sends all required data: guest personal information, document data, arrival/departure dates, accommodation type, and tourist tax. Everything happens in real-time without manual entry. Fully compliant with Serbian law on tourist registration. Eliminates manual entry and errors.

q5.question: Which payment methods are supported?
q5.answer: We support: 1) Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Maestro, Dina Card via integrated POS terminal, 2) Contactless NFC payments (Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay), 3) QR code payments (DinaQR, PaySpot), 4) Direct billing to PMS (payment at checkout). Integration with all leading PSPs in the region (Monri, CorvusPay, Stripe). PCI DSS Level 1 Compliant with full encryption.

q6.question: Does the system work offline?
q6.answer: Yes, the system has advanced offline mode! In case of internet connection loss, the kiosk continues to operate using local cache of reservations for the next 7 days. Guests can complete check-in, the system caches transactions, and everything automatically syncs when internet returns. We recommend backup 4G/LTE connection for maximum reliability (99.9% uptime).

q7.question: How is system maintenance and updates performed?
q7.answer: Software updates are performed automatically (night updates 2-4 AM) or manually according to your preferences. You can choose whether you want automatic updates or to manually approve each update. Notifications about new versions arrive via admin panel. Hardware maintenance is recommended once a year (cleaning, calibration). The package includes 12 months of free updates. Remote administration via Cloud Dashboard.

q8.question: What about data protection and GDPR compliance?
q8.answer: The system is fully GDPR compliant. All data is encrypted (AES-256), stored on EU servers (Frankfurt/Amsterdam), automatically deleted after the legally required period (3 years), and we have a DPA (Data Processing Agreement) for each installation. SSL/TLS 1.3 for all connections, 2FA authentication for admin panel, audit log of all actions, and complete transparency in data usage. ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certified.

q9.question: Can I customize the kiosk appearance and branding?
q9.answer: Absolutely! We offer complete custom branding: your logo, colors, fonts, background images, video presentations, custom welcome messages, multilanguage content, and branding on the physical kiosk (vinyl wrap). In the Enterprise package, we also offer completely custom UI design tailored to your brand. Design is set up via admin panel without needing code. Drag-and-drop editor with live preview.

q10.question: What happens if a guest has a problem during check-in?
q10.answer: The system has a 'Help' button that connects the guest with reception via video call or intercom. Also, the kiosk automatically detects problems (invalid card, document error) and displays clear instructions. Your staff can remotely take control of the kiosk and help the guest. We also have 24/7 technical support. Multi-level support: on-screen help ‚Üí video call ‚Üí remote assistance ‚Üí 24/7 tech support.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We transform the way hotels welcome their guests through innovative technology and excellent support.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Principles that guide our work and relationships with clients
story.p1: Inova Tech IT is a company specialized in developing innovative IT solutions for the hospitality industry. Founded in 2017, our mission was clear - to transform traditional reception into a modern, automated system.
story.p2: Inova Tech IT has offices in Prague and Belgrade.
story.p3: We recognized that hotels lose valuable time on manual check-in processes, leading to long queues, frustrated guests, and increased operational costs. Our solution - Digital Reception - enables check-in in just 30 seconds, 24/7 availability, and significant cost reduction.
story.p4: Today, with over 50 successful installations, we continue to innovate and improve our system. Every feedback from clients makes us better, every success of our partners is our success.
